results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ሰማይም በተሰነጠቀችና እንደ ጽጌረዳ፣ እንደታረበ ቆዳ በኾነች ጊዜ፤ (ጭንቁን ምን አበረታው)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በዚያም ቀን ሰውም ጃንም ከኃጢኣቱ ገና አይጠየቅም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከሓዲዎች በምልክታቸው ይታወቃሉ፡፡ አናቶቻቸውንና ጫማዎቻቸውንም ይያዛሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
